name: Wkórwek
description: In Wkórwek the player controls a bouncing ball around a screen, filled with deadly obstables. The goal is to safely maneuver the ball into an indentation in the bottom right corner of the screen, which opens up the next level. Wkórwek made its debut on the "Deregeneracja Party 2015", a Polish Atari scene party.

shot.caption: The game starts directly with level 1 w/o a title screen.
